Subject: Re: My Decepticons/Brotherhood-Hell Beast Battle
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

"Ive got no more time to waist with you Maximal idiot" Motormaster spat, he
noticed Speedbreaker's grip wavering, he put his gun down, and flung
Firearm to the side, quite viciously. Firearm was sent hurteling quite far,
about 50 feet away from there position, and without anyone to hold him up,
he started to plumet, starting at the 650 foot height, "Save him, or slag
us Maximal" he then patted Astroblast, getting him ready to fly.
